name: neuropilot
description: Lets Neuro-sama provide inline completions in VS Code

neuropilot.websocketUrl.description: The URL to use for completions

neuropilot.gameName.description: The name to use for this "game"

neuropilot.beforeContext.description: The number of lines before the cursor position to include in the completion request

neuropilot.afterContext.description: The number of lines after the cursor position to include in the completion request

neuropilot.maxCompletions.description: The maximum number of completions to request

enumDescriptions: Only request completions when the user explicitly invokes the completion provider
Automatically request completions when the user stops typing

neuropilot.initialContext.default: You are using an extension in Visual Studio Code that allows you to suggest code to Vedal. You will receive the lines of code before and after the cursor position and then be able to suggest what Vedal should write next.
neuropilot.initialContext.description: The initial context to sent to Neuro-sama
